title: Boards Act 2013 (No. 11 of 2013) and having regard to the matters set out in
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Education and Training Boards Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Education and Training Boards Act 

2013 (Composition of Local Authority Membership) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited education training board act 2013 (composition local authority membership) order 2024

title: Boards Act 2013 (No. 11 of 2013) and having regard to the matters set out in
heading: 2. A local authority specified in column (1) of the Schedule shall elect the
text_raw:
2. A local authority specified in column (1) of the Schedule shall elect the 
number of members specified in column (2) of the Schedule opposite the 
reference to the local authority, to the education and training board specified in 
column (3) of the Schedule, opposite the reference to the local authority 
concerned.
text_norm: 2 local authority specified column (1) schedule shall elect number member specified column (2) schedule opposite reference local authority education training board specified column (3) schedule opposite reference local authority concerned

title: Boards Act 2013 (No. 11 of 2013) and having regard to the matters set out in
heading: 3. The Education and Training Boards Act 2013 (Composition of Local
text_raw:
3. The Education and Training Boards Act 2013 (Composition of Local 

Authority Membership) Order 2014 (SI 272/2014) is revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 31st May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [243] 3
text_norm: 3 education training board act 2013 (composition local authority membership) order 2014 (si 272 2014) revoked notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 31st may 2024 243 3

title: Boards Act 2013 (No. 11 of 2013) and having regard to the matters set out in
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order specifies the number of members each local authority will elect to 
the corresponding education and training board in those education and training 
boards where more than one local authority is specified in column (2) of 
Schedule 4 of the Education and Training Boards Act 2013. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [243]
